manager - Variable in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Managers.Assets
 
Map - Class in uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps
This class is generates a Tiled Map which can be loaded onto a Screen.
Map(String, Assets) - Constructor for class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.Map
The constructor loads the graphic layers of the tmx-map-file and sets them up into a map-renderer Additionally it loads all graphic layers for the on screen controller (initially they are invisible).

MapScreen - Class in uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens
Abstract class for almost every screen, that will be used in our PacManGame.
MapScreen(PacManGame, Assets, String, MapScreen.Type) - Constructor for class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.MapScreen
Abstract constructor, that creates the screens depending on the type of screen with all the basic features that are needed in every screen.
MapScreen.Type - Enum in uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens
 
mapWidth - Static variable in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.Map

MenuMap - Class in uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps
This class provides a simple map for the purpose of creating menus.
MenuMap(String, Assets) - Constructor for class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.MenuMap
Does the same as the parent constructor, but creates no additional collectables.
MenuScreen - Class in uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens
The MenuScreen is the first screen you will see when inside the game.

mouthOpen - Variable in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Actor
 
move() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Actor
This method moves the Actor as long as it's way isn't blocked.
move() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.PacMan
Moves like an Actor, but additionally collects dots and items while walking.
